description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for a login screen in a mobile application. It includes UI elements such as text fields, buttons, and navigation logic to handle user sign-in using a token.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the login screen, allowing users to input a token and navigate to the dashboard.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI state for LoginScreen, including user input handling and sign-in logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Releases resources used by the _tokenCtrl controller when the widget is disposed.

methods.name: _signIn
methods.description: Handles the sign-in process, validating input, invoking provider method, and navigating on success.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen UI.
